sentences.en: A new algorithm of system time synchronization by training sequence is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种基于混沌训练序列的系统定时同步新算法.

sentences.en: A playout control scheme for media synchronization implemented by receivers is proposed.
sentences.cn: 摘要提出一种在接收端实现的媒体同步拉制算法.

sentences.en: Analyse the impacts of each synchronization error to the system.
sentences.cn: 分析各种同步误差对系统性能影响.

sentences.en: And the synchronous clock is a key of the synchronization network.
sentences.cn: 而其中同步时钟是同步网的关键.

sentences.en: Categories; and appointment system and customers to register the Synchronization Wizard Manual.
sentences.cn: 分类目录; 与预约系统和顾客名册同步的向导手册.

sentences.en: I is the initial is less on your footsteps, or midway lost and you synchronization frequency?
sentences.cn: 我是初始就更不上你的脚步，还是中途丢失了和你同步的频率呢？

sentences.en: In binary synchronous communication, the use of clock pulses to control synchronization of data and control characters.
sentences.cn: 在二进制位同步通信中，使用时钟脉冲来控制数据和控制字符的同步。

sentences.en: In recording, the synchronization of sound tracks to a picture.
sentences.cn: 在录象技术中, 声道与图象的同步.

sentences.en: My next step is to wire them up using a common channel as a shared synchronization mechanism and then kick each one off.
sentences.cn: 下一步就是使用一个用作共享同步机制的公共通道把它们联系在一起，然后从中剔除一个进程。

sentences.en: Objective To study the generalized projective synchronization of different chaotic systems.
sentences.cn: 目的研究异结构系统混沌广义投影同步.

sentences.en: The common methods are relative synchronization, multi - phase clock sample and so on.
sentences.cn: 常规的方案有相关同步法和多相位时钟采样法等.

sentences.en: The invention relates to a data synchronization method and system.
sentences.cn: 本发明是有关于一种资料同步方法与系统.

sentences.en: The paper presents control? synchronization & exclusiveness and communication of multithread.
sentences.cn: 介绍线程的控制、同步 与 互斥和通信的技术.

sentences.en: The replication synchronization attempt was abandoned because of a lack of updates.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏更新,放弃复制同步尝试.

sentences.en: The system need not accurate synchronization control, thus is simplified.
sentences.cn: 系统不需要精确的同步和功率控制, 从而简化了系统.

sentences.en: The transmission of complete machine adopts AC vector electrical motor synchronization control.
sentences.cn: 整机传动采用交流矢量电机同步控制.

sentences.en: This is a good alternative if your objective is to eliminate synchronization.
sentences.cn: 如果您的目标是消除同步，则这将是一个很好的选择。

sentences.en: To deal with these troubles, SyncML Initiative issued SyncML Data Synchronization Specification.
sentences.cn: 为了解决数据同步领域中存在的这些问题,数据同步论坛组织—SyncML发起 组(SyncML　Initiative)根据通用数据同步协议的要求,制定了SyncML数据同步规范.

sentences.en: What happens to systems not under the control of the synchronization service?
sentences.cn: 系统不在同步服务的控制范围内，会发生什么？

sentences.en: With perfect synchronization, two other girls cartwheeled toward the ropes.
sentences.cn: 另外两个女孩同时朝着绳索做侧手翻，动作整齐划一，完美无瑕。

trans.tran_cn: 同一时刻，同步，使时间互相一致，同时性
